Detailed Description

SparseMart Class for representing only a subset of cel file intensity data in memory.

Can save a lot of the space if not all of a cel file needs to be remembered for downstream analysis.

Only store needed probes (red) in memory. Use a translation vector to avoid having to reset probes ids in memory.
